title: The Pentridge experience. Part 1
brief_description: Shows the grim conditions of the reception prison, where men awaiting trial are retained, and the classification process that convicted prisoners undergo. Interviews with prisoners discuss the lack of privacy and associated problems, and the new “term of natural life” sentence. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
